profile:
Turning our Dream Home Into A Reality
Licensed Contractor, Licensed Master Electrician, ESA #7009037
Household Renovations: kitchens, bathrooms, living space, basements remodeling, flooring, electrical, exterior and interior, adding new living space etc.
Commercial Renovations: Offices/meeting space, work rooms, washrooms, commercial electrical etc
Services include: electrical, framing, all kinds of flooring, tear-out and rebuild, drywall, tile, decks, fencing, retaining walls, painting etc.
The Renovation Realities Contracting Advantage: Reliable, Exceptional value, complete on time, committed to building a long-term relationship based on client satisfaction.
We can design a complete solution for you or work with your thoughts/ideas and build your vision
Highest level of craftsmanship
Understand Needs and Budget
Great attention to detail
We work ell with Do-it-yourself'ers and help them ensure safety and building standards are met
Communication is key: we maintain open lines of communication through the entire project so you always know how the work is progressing
We analyze each client's needs and design/build to fulfill those needs
Renovation coaching -assisting and encouraging you to reach your potential
We have experience working closely with our clients in a team environment. This mutual respect is the foundation of our success
Commitment - we are proactive in finding solutions for our clients that achieve their goals
We turn the ordinary into something extraordinary

Every project is as individual as the family that will be living in it, our work is designed to suit your specific lifestyle and budget.
